name: Chromacore!
description:
No ads, no in-app purchases, just the game!

Story:

Teli is a rogue , a color thief. In this bleak dystopian world ruled by the The Five, everything is black and white. The Five are a rogue council of mages that discovered a method to get immense power and become rulers : absorb all the color from the world to fuel their power. Thus, the only hope left for this bleak world are the color thieves ...

Can Teli succeed where all others failed?

Help Teli get the color back !

Chromacore is a 2D musical platformer set in a dark, black & white world that progressively becomes more colorful and happy through successful gameplay.

Positive audiovisual feedback rewards players for successful gameplay, while negative feedback pushes you back.
